channel.title: WMC Environment on Home
channel.description: Recent content in WMC Environment on Home

item.title: Recycling bins in our community
item.description: In the classroom NOTE: This is still a work in progress Most people in our community know that the paper recycling bins in each classroom can be used for paper recycling. However, what you might not know is that along with paper recycling, people are free to put cans, bottles, and other recyclable goods in their classroom’s blue bins! When it comes to this, there are still plenty of students (and even staff!

item.title: About
item.description: Who are we? We are the WMC Environmental Club! Our club activities and projects consist of finding ways to make positive environmental impacts in our community. This ranges from cleaning up litter in our local area, to fundraising campaigns for non-profit organizations. More info on the club and the things we do can be found on the our instagram: @wmcienvironmentalclub. We meet every Friday at lunch, so feel free to stop by if you’d like to be apart of our community!
